33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Dinar, that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said: 'When my Ummah walks in a proud march, and its servants are the children of kings, children of Persians and Romans, the evilest of them will be set over the best of them

chapter.eng-name: When The Evil Among My Ummah Will Be Set Over The Best Of Them
